web-app.description:
A servlet that uses a "pure" DSO service, inside a container but outside of the context of a session, use an URL of '/[path to servlet]/[command]' path to access it.
[path to servlet] should be of the form: http[s]://<server>/<webapp-name>/ack
Commands may be one of "ack" or "init": "init" takes two query parameters "name" (optional) and "worker-count" (required) to create/replace the Ack service.
